p2p.basic
Interface Message

All Known Subinterfaces:
PGridMessage
All Known Implementing Classes:
ACKMessage, BootstrapMessage, BootstrapReplyMessage, ChallengeMessage, ChallengeReplyMessage, DataModifierMessage, ExchangeInvitationMessage, ExchangeMessage, ExchangeReplyMessage, GenericMessage, InitMessage, InitResponseMessage, MessageHeader, PeerLookupMessage, PeerLookupReplyMessage, QueryMessage, QueryReplyMessage, RangeQueryMessage, ReplicateMessage, SearchPathMessage, SearchPathReplyMessage
public interface Message

Defines a message that peers exchange. Most systems will use multiple types of messages in their protocols, and thus several implementations of this interface will be required.

Method Summary
 byte[] getData()
          Get the message content.
 GUID getGUID()
          Get the message's guid.
 

Method Detail

getGUID

GUID getGUID()
Get the message's guid. Useful to determine if a message has already been observed previously.

Returns:
the global unique identifier

getData

byte[] getData()
Get the message content.

Returns:
a binary representation of the message
